	External calls:
	- alreadyMinted = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/34/0x2e0b77cd408989a8f09e22d2c832be793f167aae.sol)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0x2e0b77cd408989a8f09e22d2c832be793f167aae.sol#460-469) does not use the value returned by external calls:

FrameworkInvest.finish (/unique_chucks/34/0x2e0b77cd408989a8f09e22d2c832be793f167aae.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(token).mint(_reserveFund,tokensForReserve) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2e0b77cd408989a8f09e22d2c832be793f167aae.sol)
	-MintableToken(token).mint(_bountyFund,tokensForBounty) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2e0b77cd408989a8f09e22d2c832be793f167aae.sol)
